trans-unit.source: Provides an interface to expose Win32 HWND handles.
This interface is implemented on objects that expose Win32 HWND handles.
trans-unit.target: Questa interfaccia viene implementata su oggetti che espongono gli handle Win32 HWND.

trans-unit.source: The resultant handle can be used with Win32 API calls.
trans-unit.target: L'handle risulta può essere utilizzato con le chiamate API Win32.

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property of `label1` to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window.Handle%2A> of `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> proprietà di `label1` corrente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window.Handle%2A> di `Form1`.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> called `Form1` with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> called `label1` on it.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio si presuppone un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> chiamato `Form1` con un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> chiamato `label1` su di esso.

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle to the window represented by the implementer.
A handle to the window represented by the implementer.
trans-unit.target: Un handle alla finestra rappresentato dall'implementatore.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementer, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window.Handle%2A> property could change during the life of the window.
trans-unit.target: In base al responsabile dell'implementazione, il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window.Handle%2A> proprietà potrebbero essere modificate durante il ciclo di vita della finestra.

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property of `label1` to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window.Handle%2A> of `Form1`.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> proprietà di `label1` corrente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window.Handle%2A> di `Form1`.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> called `Form1` with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> called `label1` on it.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio si presuppone un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> chiamato `Form1` con un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> chiamato `label1` su di esso.
